rna273.flavor: It drains vitality from those it touches.
rna273.title: The Haunt of Hightower

ana49.flavor: The banks of the Luxa River attract all manner of predator but only the most resilient of prey.
ana49.title: Ancient Crab

ana50.flavor: "If you want them dead, buy some poison. If you want them to have the worst day of their life before dying, then let's talk price."
ana50.title: Hired Blade

war4.flavor: Planeswalkers conjured replicas of old allies, reminders of the homeworlds that would fall next if Bolas prevailed.
war4.title: Ajani's Pridemate

war5.flavor: "Welcome to the Legion. You saved a district—now let's go save the world."
war5.title: Battlefield Promotion

war6.flavor: "We agree that order benefits everyone, but not until you enforce it."
war6.title: Bond of Discipline

war7.flavor: "Where did she come from? More importantly, are there more like her?" —Gideon Jura
war7.title: Bulwark Giant

war8.flavor:
"There's something peculiar about the cats today."
—Janoc, Tin Street tinker
war8.title: Charmed Stray

war9.flavor: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."
war9.title: Defiant Strike

war10.flavor: Ravnica's defenders watched in horror as Oketra's shot pierced the body of the pegasus. Gideon tumbled through the air, Blackblade in hand.
war10.title: Divine Arrow

war11.flavor:
"A company of infantry is trapped behind the lines. We need to strike hard and fast to free them, or the casualties will be horrific. Send the griffins."
—Tajic
war11.title: Enforcer Griffin

war12.flavor: The sky boiled over the citadel, dire and dark. Then the angels brought the dawn.
war12.title: Finale of Glory

war14.flavor: To Liliana's surprise, the cost of betraying Bolas did not fall on her.
war14.title: Gideon's Sacrifice

war15.flavor: His triumph came not from victory over his enemies, but from the salvation of those who survived.
war15.title: Gideon's Triumph

war18.flavor:
"If you can't save yourself, you fight to give someone else a chance."
—Ajani Goldmane
war18.title: Ignite the Beacon

war19.flavor:
"We need to block the exits from the plaza! What's big, heavy, and available?"
—Gideon Jura
war19.title: Ironclad Krovod

war20.flavor:
"See that no one enters or leaves New Prahv today. And notify me at once of any Planeswalker activity."
—Dovin Baan
war20.title: Law-Rune Enforcer

war21.flavor: His voice is both war horn and rallying cry, a trumpeting call that stirs even the faintest heart.
war21.title: Loxodon Sergeant

war22.flavor: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.
war22.title: Makeshift Battalion

war23.flavor: "If I am to die in service, there is no more worthy fight than this."
war23.title: Martyr for the Cause

war25.flavor: "I don't understand. He's normally so well behaved!"
war25.title: Pouncing Lynx

war26.flavor: After millennia to craft victory, Bolas had eternity to contemplate defeat.
war26.title: Prison Realm

war27.flavor: Even the clouds became a field of battle. Known as the Sky Theater, it saw the Eternals clash with squadrons of angels.
war27.title: Rally of Wings

war28.flavor: The heart of Ravnica disappeared before anyone could strike a blow in its defense.
war28.title: Ravnica at War

war29.flavor: Grief is a crucible where resolve is tempered.
war29.title: Rising Populace

war30.flavor:
Not even a threat to the entire Multiverse
could persuade them to put aside their feud.
war30.title: Single Combat

war31.flavor: At Feather's command, squadrons of battle angels swarmed out of the Parhelion II, unsheathing blades made of molten dawn.
war31.title: Sunblade Angel

war33.flavor: Teyo gifted his shields to as many allies as possible, knowing he could not always be there to protect them himself.
war33.title: Teyo's Lightshield

war34.flavor: "Some bend the law. I tie it into knots."
war34.title: Tomik, Distinguished Advokist

war35.flavor: Bolas cared little when his statue fell, thinking it a useful distraction, underestimating the surge of resolve it gave his opponents.
war35.title: Topple the Statue

war36.flavor: "Would you give your life to save this world?" Gideon murmured. The pegasus snorted and spread wide its mighty wings.
war36.title: Trusted Pegasus

war38.flavor:
"Precise, clean cuts. No one saw anything. Again. Tag the report with my code and file it."
—Lavinia
war38.title: Wanderer's Strike

war39.flavor: Soaring over Vitu-Ghazi, New Prahv, and Orzhova, the Conclave's trained falcons provided critical intelligence.
war39.title: War Screecher

war40.flavor:
"Fear writhes and whispers in the shadows of your mind. It is the enemy you always knew would come."
—Ashiok
war40.title: Ashiok's Skulker

war41.flavor: "There is no future save the one my master wills."
war41.title: Augur of Bolas

war42.flavor:
"I've never seen the firemane angels so anxious."
—Tajic
war42.title: Aven Eternal

war43.flavor: "Together we can unlock secrets no one has even dreamed of. I might even let you remember some of them."
war43.title: Bond of Insight

war44.flavor:
"They make it clear we are nothing to them."
—Lavinia
war44.title: Callous Dismissal

war46.flavor: Niv-Mizzet had perfected a plan, but he had no control over the mortal minds who had to agree to implement it.
war46.title: Contentious Plan

war47.flavor:
"All I ask is complete obedience."
—Nicol Bolas
war47.title: Crush Dissent

war48.flavor: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"
war48.title: Erratic Visionary

war51.flavor: Ugin saw the gem that connected Bolas to his Meditation Realm as the key to his brother's downfall.
war51.title: Finale of Revelation

war52.flavor: "Inform our allies in the Tenth and throw the circuit. It's about to get weird."
war52.title: Flux Channeler

war55.flavor: His triumph was not in outsmarting Bolas's plan, but in understanding why ultimate power is self-defeating.
war55.title: Jace's Triumph

war57.flavor:
"Hop away now, little Eternal. Go eat some flies."
—Kasmina
war57.title: Kasmina's Transmutation

war58.flavor:
"When your enemy flees, send the sea to pursue them."
—Kiora
war58.title: Kiora's Dambreaker

war60.flavor:
"I recognize that headdress. This one was feared even by her fellow initiates."
—Samut
war60.title: Naga Eternal

war62.flavor:
"In the disarray of battle, an enemy's attack may be your most convenient weapon."
—Narset
war62.title: Narset's Reversal

war63.flavor: Jace surmised that they were walking into Bolas's trap. He felt no joy in being right.
war63.title: No Escape

war64.flavor: They approach in formation, every movement efficient and sure. They halt, listen, and then press on in silent unison.
war64.title: Relentless Advance

war65.flavor: "Now, little fighter, show me you deserved this second chance."
war65.title: Rescuer Sphinx

war67.flavor: Courier owls joined the fray, attacking the Dreadhorde with a viciousness usually reserved for mail thieves.
war67.title: Sky Theater Strix

war69.flavor: They worked well as a team, but they knew it couldn't last forever.
war69.title: Spellkeeper Weird

war70.flavor:
"What they don't know will definitely hurt them."
—Lazav
war70.title: Stealth Mission

war71.flavor: Tamiyo wished only to observe the war, but she soon realized neutrality was not an option.
war71.title: Tamiyo's Epiphany

war72.flavor: "The safest place for you is not now."
war72.title: Teferi's Time Twist

war73.flavor: The arrival of the Planar Bridge caused eddies in the aether, creating some entirely new species while transforming others.
war73.title: Thunder Drake

war74.flavor: At least this was better than that week at the Juri Revue.
war74.title: Totally Lost

war75.flavor:
"It's strangely satisfying seeing an undead killing machine from another world standing befuddled in front of a wall of text."
—Lavinia
war75.title: Wall of Runes

war76.flavor: "I never liked you. Now get up—we have a fight to finish."
war76.title: Aid the Fallen

war77.flavor:
"I wish I could train a pack of them for hunting in the undercity. But I'd never dare turn my back, and I hate to think what I'd have to feed them."
—Zhosmir, urban huntmaster
war77.title: Banehound

war80.flavor: "Today we throw off the yoke of death. Either this is an affirmation of the eternal cyclical nature of life, or it's just hilarious—depends on which of us you ask."
war80.title: Bond of Revival

war81.flavor: "War or no war, your donations are due, as always."
war81.title: Charity Extractor

war82.flavor: Liliana seized the reins of Bolas's vast army, gritting her teeth behind the Chain Veil.
war82.title: Command the Dreadhorde

war84.flavor: Shadows coiled around the witness's mind. Then the moment vanished, leaving only the sting of its loss.
war84.title: Davriel's Shadowfugue

war87.flavor: The feline Eternal felt Liliana's command, looked at her disdainfully, flicked its paw, and scampered away across the rooftops.
war87.title: Dreadmalkin

war88.flavor:
Gideon eyed the Dimir emissary warily. "Could your agents slip inside Bolas's citadel?"
The figure met his gaze with icy resolve. "We already have."
war88.title: Duskmantle Operative

war89.flavor: The path to power is often paved with atrocities.
war89.title: The Elderspell

war90.flavor:
"They are called Eternals. They will never stop."
—Jace Beleren
war90.title: Eternal Taskmaster

war91.flavor: When you rule by fear, your greatest weakness is one who's no longer afraid.
war91.title: Finale of Eternity

war93.flavor: Amonkhet's dead flowed into a new world in service to their God-Pharaoh.
war93.title: Herald of the Dreadhorde

war94.flavor: The Eternals found some sparks to be quite slippery.
war94.title: Kaya's Ghostform

war95.flavor:
"I know I should be more concerned. But a big, blue zombie-potamus from beyond the stars? This is what they're invading us with?"
—Mileva, Boros legionnaire
war95.title: Lazotep Behemoth

war96.flavor: Despite their many forms, the Eternals worked in chilling harmony, unburdened by instinct or emotion.
war96.title: Lazotep Reaver

war98.flavor: Her triumph came not from escaping her death, but in claiming her independence.
war98.title: Liliana's Triumph

war101.flavor: Trapped on Ravnica with no affection for either side, Ob Nixilis sought gratification in random acts of torment.
war101.title: Ob Nixilis's Cruelty

war102.flavor: The moment Liliana defied Nicol Bolas, her contract was broken, and her life was forfeit. But she was free to choose her fate, and she decided it was worth the price.
war102.title: Price of Betrayal

war103.flavor:
"It's faster than we are. Draw its attention while the Ledev take aim!"
—Shauntal, Boros legionnaire
war103.title: Shriekdiver

war104.flavor:
"I see you're out of the wall."
—Nahiri
war104.title: Sorin's Thirst

war105.flavor: With the harvest of Domri's spark, the Elderspell began to fuel Bolas's ascension to godhood.
war105.title: Spark Harvest

war106.flavor:
"I know they're unstoppable fighters created to harvest souls—it's just they're so rude about it."
—Kaya
war106.title: Spark Reaper

war107.flavor:
"I've always said full war chests win wars, but I didn't mean by bashing enemy skulls with them."
—Teysa
war107.title: Tithebearer Giant

war109.flavor:
"No one will ever ride me again, Gideon. Expect no further favors."
—Rakdos
war109.title: Unlikely Aid

war112.flavor: "You might have pleaded your case with my queen earlier. Now I am here, and it is far too late."
war112.title: Vraska's Finisher

war113.flavor:
"Give me a crew like this one and I'd rule any sea I sailed."
—Angrath
war113.title: Ahn-Crop Invader

war114.flavor:
"Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good."
—Jaya Ballard
war114.title: Blindblast

war115.flavor:
"Give them everything you've got . . . and some things you don't."
—Ral Zarek
war115.title: Bolt Bend

war116.flavor: "Why don't we fight for what's right and let bureaucrats argue over details?"
war116.title: Bond of Passion

war117.flavor: "This day will end in death, but not the one you hoped for. This day will end in victory, but not the one you expected."
war117.title: Burning Prophet

war118.flavor:
"You say this Tenth District, not Rubblebelt. But where smash happen, that Rubblebelt. Rubblebelt state of mind."
—Urgdar, cyclops philosopher
war118.title: Chainwhip Cyclops

war120.flavor:
"Now that I've dealt with your little toys, I can focus on the real problem: you."
—Chandra Nalaar, to Dovin Baan
war120.title: Chandra's Pyrohelix

war121.flavor: Her triumph came not from achieving her ideal self, but from rejecting the idea of perfection.
war121.title: Chandra's Triumph

war123.flavor:
"For every inch of land they take from us, we take it back or we burn it. Give them nothing."
—Aurelia
war123.title: Demolish

war124.flavor: There's no crisis a hellion can't make worse.
war124.title: Devouring Hellion

war128.flavor: What he lacks in patience, intelligence, empathy, lucidity, hygiene, ability to follow orders, self-regard, and discernible skills, he makes up for in sheer chaotic violence.
war128.title: Goblin Assailant

war129.flavor: Under the veneer of the various guilds, each goblin has the same basic need: to run screaming at the enemy and hit a bunch of stuff.
war129.title: Goblin Assault Team

war130.flavor: Beneath each gleaming mineral shell rots a once-proud warrior of Amonkhet.
war130.title: Grim Initiate

war131.flavor: The mage looked within and realized there was still one piece of fuel to burn.
war131.title: Heartfire

war132.flavor: In life, they revered a diverse pantheon of gods. Now they revere only the God-Pharaoh.
war132.title: Honor the God-Pharaoh

war134.flavor:
"Fall back! You are no match for this."
—Samut
war134.title: Invading Manticore

war136.flavor: "We have visitors? Well, it'd be rude not to give them a traditional Keral Keep welcome."
war136.title: Jaya's Greeting

war137.flavor: "After the people flee, but before the enemy arrives—that's grabbin' time."
war137.title: Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin

war139.flavor: The ancient Planeswalkers Sorin and Nahiri battled across Ravnica, their blows cutting as deep as their grudge.
war139.title: Nahiri's Stoneblades

war141.flavor:
"Seeing so much easy prey makes her crazy. See how she snorts and drools?"
—Dhuuz, kronch wrangler
war141.title: Raging Kronch

war142.flavor: Samut's war was intensely personal. Every hour she faced enemies she once loved as friends and horrors she once revered as gods.
war142.title: Samut's Sprint

war144.flavor: "You once brought havoc to my home and ruined my mind. I'm here to return the favor, Bolas."
war144.title: Sarkhan's Catharsis

war145.flavor: Freed from their respective labs, the two weirds formed a partnership, feeding on the arcane energies of war.
war145.title: Spellgorger Weird

war147.flavor:
"Find out whose that is. I like its energy."
—Judith
war147.title: Tibalt's Rager

war148.flavor: Common Gruul career aspirations: berserker, shaman, catapult.
war148.title: Turret Ogre

war149.flavor:
"We fight to stop a tyrant, but we also fight for the gentle creatures who have no concept of what befalls their world."
—Vivien Reid
war149.title: Arboreal Grazer

war151.flavor:
"If you don't speak Wolf, allow me to translate: ‘One step closer and I'll rip out your throat.'"
—Arlinn Kord
war151.title: Arlinn's Wolf

war152.flavor: The Eternal armies advanced on Vitu-Ghazi. At Nissa's command, Vitu-Ghazi advanced on them.
war152.title: Awakening of Vitu-Ghazi

war153.flavor: In times of peril, the vision the ancient paruns had for their city comes into focus.
war153.title: Band Together

war154.flavor:
"Tread upon these flower beds at your own peril."
—Emmara
war154.title: Bloom Hulk

war155.flavor: "We agree that life should flourish. We disagree on the optimal number of limbs."
war155.title: Bond of Flourishing

war156.flavor: "I call upon the vigor of the grasses, the hopes of the flowers, and the dreams of the trees."
war156.title: Centaur Nurturer

war157.flavor: For most, war is a calamity. For some, an opportunity. And for the very few, a pleasure.
war157.title: Challenger Troll

war158.flavor: "Thanks to my father, I know how to fight. He also showed me why I must."
war158.title: Courage in Crisis

war159.flavor: "To care for yourself, cultivate the world. To care for the world, cultivate yourself."
war159.title: Evolution Sage

war160.flavor: Some spells sing a quiet tune. Others roar.
war160.title: Finale of Devastation

war161.flavor: The druid knew only one spell, a charm to encourage rapid plant growth. When airborne Eternals invaded her arboretum, she had to get creative.
war161.title: Forced Landing

war162.flavor:
"Sometimes Mowu is content to gnaw on a bone. Sometimes he wants the whole skeleton."
—Jiang Yanggu
war162.title: Giant Growth

war165.flavor: He listens to the sounds of battle filtering down from above, waiting for silence, waiting for his time to claim the streets.
war165.title: Kraul Stinger

war166.flavor: Looking over two city blocks of destruction, he could only cackle with pride.
war166.title: Kronch Wrangler

war167.flavor: Wherever Yanggu goes, Mowu follows—sometimes at his side, sometimes obscuring him from view entirely.
war167.title: Mowu, Loyal Companion

war170.flavor: Her triumph came not from destroying the unnatural, but from fostering life.
war170.title: Nissa's Triumph

war171.flavor: "There are many kinds of duty, and mine is to see our world grow and endure."
war171.title: Paradise Druid

war174.flavor: Elite training, single-minded devotion, and lazotep coating help only so much for invaders who are fundamentally bite-sized.
war174.title: Primordial Wurm

war175.flavor:
"Yes, nature is stronger. You don't see little buildings sprouting on trees."
—Emmara
war175.title: Return to Nature

war176.flavor:
"Let's lure the drakes to the webs over the Samok Stand. Keep the spiders content."
—Aurelia
war176.title: Snarespinner

war177.flavor: The archer's heart broke seeing her compatriots die far below, but she held position until the enemy was in range.
war177.title: Steady Aim

war178.flavor:
"If we die, we die. But we cannot let him win."
—Ajani Goldmane
war178.title: Storm the Citadel

war179.flavor:
"I thought this was a civilized plane. How are there so many feral beasts?"
—Dovin Baan
war179.title: Thundering Ceratok

war183.flavor:
"The Eternals had to endure Amonkhet's five trials. Let's see if they can pass the Trial of Ravnica."
—Jace Beleren
war183.title: Wardscale Crocodile

war185.flavor: "Grand city? No. This is nothing but another squalid cage."
war185.title: Angrath's Rampage

war188.flavor: "Whichever side wins, I'm sure the banquet will be superb."
war188.title: Cruel Celebrant

war189.flavor:
"They say nothing lasts forever. I say everything lasts forever, just not in the form you may be accustomed to." 
—Vraska
war189.title: Deathsprout

war192.flavor: "When civilization teeters on the brink, I'll be there to kick it the rest of the way."
war192.title: Domri's Ambush

war193.flavor: "I see you've learned nothing, Chandra. You'd still put a match to something rather than understand it."
war193.title: Dovin's Veto

war195.flavor:
"Be careful. You'll have more than Dovin to contend with if you hope to breach New Prahv."
—Lavinia, to Chandra Nalaar
war195.title: Elite Guardmage

war199.flavor: Kytheon had known war every day of his life. Now he finally knew peace.
war199.title: Heartwarming Redemption

war200.flavor: The essence of Ixalan was never far from Huatli's heart.
war200.title: Huatli's Raptor

war202.flavor: It feeds on the dark energies that course through the deep world—and on any other creature lured by the leyline's pull.
war202.title: Leyline Prowler

war204.flavor: Despite their stake in the city's survival, Rakdos cultists are loath to pass up any opportunity to sow chaos.
war204.title: Mayhem Devil

war209.flavor: "So everyone gets what they truly deserve, I will keep watch."
war209.title: Oath of Kaya

war210.flavor:
"No one hero will save this day. Today we must all be heroes."
—Gideon Jura
war210.title: Pledge of Unity

war212.flavor:
"Time to find the melting point of lazotep."
—Ral Zarek
war212.title: Ral's Outburst

war214.flavor: Uthlon the Wise scandalized sphinx society, hooting the answers to riddles as he rampaged through Tin Street. Grangle, on the other hand, sat for hours, deep in thought, largely ignored by fellow goblins.
war214.title: Role Reversal

war215.flavor:
"If the system is broken, break the system."
—Domri Rade
war215.title: Rubblebelt Rioters

war216.flavor:
"The primary weapon is nothing more than light. It shows them what they are, and they burn of their own accord."
—Aurelia
war216.title: Solar Blaze

war218.flavor: As the Eternal's cold fingers tightened around his throat, Domri realized what kind of master he had rushed to serve.
war218.title: Soul Diviner

war219.flavor: In times of war, only death flourishes.
war219.title: Storrev, Devkarin Lich

war222.flavor:
"The Tenth is under heavy attack, but it's being handled. I sent Mileva."
—Tajic
war222.title: Tenth District Legionnaire

war223.flavor:
"To comprehend the full answer requires years of temporal study. In short, they were now never born in the first place."
—Teferi
war223.title: Time Wipe

war225.flavor:
"The hero with the magic sword slays the dragon? Not this time."
—Nicol Bolas
war225.title: Tyrant's Scorn

war237.flavor: The city mourned Niv-Mizzet's death, but he left behind the components for his rebirth.
war237.title: Firemind Vessel

war238.flavor: A dictator's infuriating smirk, an affront to everything Ravnica stood for.
war238.title: God-Pharaoh's Statue

war239.flavor:
"Hopefully Ravnica will prove harder to break."
—Karn
war239.title: Guild Globe

war240.flavor:
"Why would someone have built . . . wait, never mind. Send it to the front lines!"
—Commander Grozdan
war240.title: Iron Bully

war241.flavor:
"I don't care if it's an all-powerful relic or a street vendor's lucky charm. If it brings you courage, wear it."
—Saheeli Rai
war241.title: Mana Geode

war242.flavor: It didn't budge when the portal opened, nor when the ancient gods emerged. It came to life only when all ten guilds came together to face a common threat.
war242.title: Prismite

war243.flavor: "Track the source of those thopters," Saheeli told her creation. "And feel free to snack on as many as you want."
war243.title: Saheeli's Silverwing

war245.flavor: The Planar Bridge opened over the Chamber of the Guildpact, reducing the symbol of Ravnica's endurance to rubble.
war245.title: Emergence Zone

war246.flavor: Guild leaders focused their magic on the portal scar. Where the Chamber perished, a parun could be reborn.
war246.title: Gateway Plaza

war248.flavor:
"I can't protect everyone here. But those I can, I will."
—Karn
war248.title: Karn's Bastion

war249.flavor: Sometimes the strongest weapon you can hold in your hand is another hand.
war249.title: Mobilized District

war266.flavor: Ravnica held its breath as the hero of the resistance—their last hope—flew through the sky, his dark sword ready to strike a god.
war266.title: Desperate Lunge

war267.flavor: "Break their formation! Thin their ranks! I'm right behind you!"
war267.title: Gideon's Battle Cry

war269.flavor:
"So much wealth. So much splendor. So much temptation to believe the gilded lie."
—Kaya
war269.title: Orzhov Guildgate

war272.flavor: "Pardon me if I seem distracted. Part of me is reconnoitering the Tenth District."
war272.title: Jace's Projection

war273.flavor: "The Eternals can recognize faces. They just think I look like a blue minotaur."
war273.title: Jace's Ruse

war274.flavor:
"Mystery is beauty. Within the unknown we plumb revelation."
—Vannifar
war274.title: Simic Guildgate

war190.flavor: Liliana whispered to whatever consciousness Oketra and Bontu had left. "You are the gods. He is the usurper. You know what to do."
war190.title: Despark

war201.flavor: Death greeted the world with a roar of desert air.
war201.title: Invade the City

war203.flavor:
"The ancient places of Ravnica awaken, stirred by the hoofbeats of Ilharg!"
—Nikya of the Old Ways
war203.title: Living Twister

m201.flavor:
"Oh, you must be mistaken. Hawks are solitary hunters, you see."
—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologist
m201.title: Aerial Assault

m206.flavor: Waves of gloom crash in vain against his unyielding light.
m206.title: Apostle of Purifying Light

m207.flavor: "With me! Break this line and the rest will fall!"
m207.title: Battalion Foot Soldier

m208.flavor: "Within every angel is a spirit of light that will fight as long as there is darkness."
m208.title: Bishop of Wings

m209.flavor:
"As long as your courage remains, your life will not falter."
—Sephara, Sky's Blade
m209.title: Brought Back

m2011.flavor: "As the sun rose behind the Bone Spire, an angel appeared over the charnel fields, bringing a surge of new hope." —Krinnea, Siege of the Bone Spire
m2011.title: Dawning Angel

m2012.flavor: "May the light shine through me to guide the lost."
m2012.title: Daybreak Chaplain

m2013.flavor:
"It is not punishment. I am simply making things as they should be."
—Sephara, Sky's Blade
m2013.title: Devout Decree

m2014.flavor: Where the holy light of the angels has shone, only purity remains.
m2014.title: Disenchant

m2015.flavor: "Well, at least it's a lovely view."
m2015.title: Eternal Isolation

m2016.flavor: "Go find yourself a couple of friends, and bring me a blindfold. Then we might have a fair fight."
m2016.title: Fencing Ace

m2020.flavor:
"Here is a companion who will never falter, no matter how desperate the battle!"
—Ajani Goldmane
m2020.title: Griffin Protector

m2021.flavor: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.
m2021.title: Griffin Sentinel

m2023.flavor: "Fear neither clouds nor darkness. The light shall overcome them all."
m2023.title: Herald of the Sun

m2024.flavor: "We are armed with light and steel. Who can stand against us?"
m2024.title: Inspired Charge

m2025.flavor: "Time to show the foe our true mettle."
m2025.title: Inspiring Captain

m2028.flavor:
"Even if I should die in the saddle, she will not let me fall to the ground."
—Hypatia of the Winged Horse
m2028.title: Loyal Pegasus

m2029.flavor: Phyrexian artificers remove the flesh they no longer need and use it to bring their unholy creations to a greater semblance of life.
m2029.title: Master Splicer

m2030.flavor: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."
m2030.title: Moment of Heroism

m2031.flavor: Inquisitors are taught scripture, philosophy, and the fine art of sharpening an axe.
m2031.title: Moorland Inquisitor

m2032.flavor: "Can't a fella get a moment's peace around here?"
m2032.title: Pacifism

m2034.flavor: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.
m2034.title: Raise the Alarm

m2035.flavor: The law is meant to ensure that people kill each other with only the utmost fairness.
m2035.title: Rule of Law

m2037.flavor: "Healing is more art than magic. Well, there is still quite a bit of magic."
m2037.title: Soulmender

m2038.flavor: The strength of the one is the strength of the many.
m2038.title: Squad Captain

m2039.flavor: "The realm of the gods opens before me!"
m2039.title: Starfield Mystic

m2040.flavor: "Get up, slugabeds! We've got company, and they're not dressed for a party!"
m2040.title: Steadfast Sentry

m2041.flavor: The courage of those who work the land is born of long days of labor in the hot summer sun and the cold winter wind. It is the courage of the earth itself.
m2041.title: Yoked Ox

m2042.flavor: The chill wind extinguishes flame, and frosts the leaf on the branch.
m2042.title: Aether Gust

m2043.flavor: "The more secrets you have, the more easily you become my pawn."
m2043.title: Agent of Treachery

m2044.flavor: As the ship approached, the jade totem rose high overhead. Power rippled. Eyes of stone glowed and crackled. Out hissed a breath of the world, and a windstorm came alive.
m2044.title: Air Elemental

m2045.flavor: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.
m2045.title: Anticipate

m2047.flavor: The trick to talking sense into Keldons is getting them to hold still.
m2047.title: Befuddle

m2048.flavor:
"I can think of worse ways to go. On second thought, maybe not."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist
m2048.title: Bone to Ash

m2050.flavor: "I always attack from where their spyglasses can't see."
m2050.title: Brineborn Cutthroat

m2053.flavor: Dragons avoid the bright colors of its wings.
m2053.title: Cerulean Drake

m2054.flavor: "I can see which way the wind is blowing."
m2054.title: Cloudkin Seer

m2055.flavor: "Let's see how badly you want what you came for!"
m2055.title: Convolute

m2056.flavor:
"From a sea of infinite possibilities, our choices create the future."
—Mu Yanling
m2056.title: Drawn from Dreams

m2058.flavor: One faerie distracts the judge while a second steals the law.
m2058.title: Faerie Miscreant

m2059.flavor:
"I have wept such a torrent as to scour the land clean."
—Mu Yanling
m2059.title: Flood of Tears

m2060.flavor: Unbreakable and unappetizing, the crab grows uninterrupted, sometimes to the size of a cottage and beyond.
m2060.title: Fortress Crab

m2061.flavor:
"Reel it in. No, wait! Throw it back!"
—Gertrude, deep-sea angler
m2061.title: Frilled Sea Serpent

m2062.flavor: It readily attacks much larger prey, knowing retaliation is impossible.
m2062.title: Frost Lynx

m2063.flavor: A good book is a refuge, but a great book is a fortress.
m2063.title: Hard Cover

m2066.flavor: "Well, if that goblin didn't want his tongue pierced, he shouldn't have stuck it out at me."
m2066.title: Metropolis Sprite

m2067.flavor:
"Come on, it's not even that deep!"
—Gorin the Brazen
m2067.title: Moat Piranhas

m2069.flavor: "As one, nature lifts its voice to tell you this: ‘No.'"
m2069.title: Negate

m2070.flavor: In every swirl of the tide, it sees the awakening of things yet to come.
m2070.title: Octoprophet

m2071.flavor:
"If you need to disappear for a while, I know a place."
—Bilivus, master archivist
m2071.title: Portal of Sanctuary

m2073.flavor: "Forget what you have learned from other teachers. I bring you the truth."
m2073.title: Sage's Row Denizen

m2074.flavor: "I study the past to find hope for the future."
m2074.title: Scholar of the Ages

m2076.flavor:
"Any ship that sails on these mean seas for long is bound to pick up a ghost or two."
—Admiral Beckett Brass
m2076.title: Spectral Sailor

m2077.flavor:
"When you are gone, will anyone remember your story?"
—Unknown
m2077.title: Tale's End

m2078.flavor:
"Don't you have somewhere else to be?"
—Sharuum the Hegemon
m2078.title: Unsummon

m2079.flavor: On Evos Isle, the swift and formidable aven enforce the will of the ruling sphinxes.
m2079.title: Warden of Evos Isle

m2080.flavor: Magic written across the sky falls like rain on thirsty ground, bringing forth wisdom in its season.
m2080.title: Winged Words

m2081.flavor: "Yarok's waters rush and rage Where armies bled into the sand." —Lament for Bala Ged, stanza 2
m2081.title: Yarok's Wavecrasher

m2082.flavor: "The knights charged forward on wings of wind, and the necromancer's horde roared in helpless rage." —Krinnea, Siege of the Bone Spire
m2082.title: Zephyr Charge

m2083.flavor:
"Your death will take a mere moment, but it will feel like an eternity."
—Vilis, Broker of Blood
m2083.title: Agonizing Syphon

m2084.flavor: "Skill, imagination, smarts: none of it matters unless you have the nerve to use it."
m2084.title: Audacious Thief

m2085.flavor: "Poor little sun-dweller out past curfew. And to think, you might have survived if it wasn't so close to suppertime."
m2085.title: Barony Vampire

m2086.flavor: "One knife, two knives, three knives, four—which will drop you to the floor?"
m2086.title: Bladebrand

m2087.flavor: Leaf and soul alike wither at its touch.
m2087.title: Blightbeetle

m2088.flavor:
"You've heard that a vampire can't enter a home without an invitation? A lie meant to help you sleep at night."
—Kerin, watch sergeant
m2088.title: Blood Burglar

m2090.flavor: Blood seeps into the stone, and darkness emerges.
m2090.title: Bloodsoaked Altar

m2091.flavor: A circus acrobat in life, she kills with such fluid grace that even her victims are awed by her performance.
m2091.title: Bloodthirsty Aerialist

m2092.flavor:
"I will make your bones into a weapon that will lay even the mighty low."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen
m2092.title: Bone Splinters

m2093.flavor: "Living or dead, everyone responds to the proper motivation."
m2093.title: Boneclad Necromancer

m2095.flavor:
"Let this serve as a reminder of your failure."
—Exdratha, bog witch
m2095.title: Disfigure

m2096.flavor: It beckons silently, waiting in the darkness.
m2096.title: Dread Presence

m2099.flavor: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."
m2099.title: Epicure of Blood

m20100.flavor: "It was a bad evening for you, mate. Now it's chow time for the sharks."
m20100.title: Fathom Fleet Cutthroat

m20101.flavor:
"If you manage to get to the heart of the bog, you'll find things there that make zombies seem downright lovable."
—Byaras, backwoods guide
m20101.title: Feral Abomination

m20103.flavor: In Amonkhet's ever-shifting sands, nothing stays buried for long.
m20103.title: Gravedigger

m20104.flavor: His whips twist and tremble like living things, moved by the fury of the horde he commands.
m20104.title: Gruesome Scourger

m20106.flavor: "With a single word, they were unmade." —Krinnea, Siege of the Bone Spire
m20106.title: Legion's End

m20108.flavor: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.
m20108.title: Mind Rot

m20109.flavor:
"By fate or by will, every reign must come to an end."
—Kethis, the Hidden Hand
m20109.title: Murder

m20110.flavor:
"The bog doesn't give a stinking bubble about your title, wealth, or piety. It's just hungry."
—Byaras, backwoods guide
m20110.title: Noxious Grasp

m20112.flavor: His mind was lost long before his flesh.
m20112.title: Sanitarium Skeleton

m20113.flavor:
"One for you, one for me. What could be more fair?"
—Kethis, the Hidden Hand
m20113.title: Scheming Symmetry

m20114.flavor: "The Great Serpent slumbers now, but all warmbloods will grovel in the dirt at its awakening!"
m20114.title: Sorcerer of the Fang

m20116.flavor: The first mistake the Grimnant knights made was bullying the owner of an Urborg corpse shop. Their second mistake was dying.
m20116.title: Soul Salvage

m20117.flavor:
"The skull is rigid, but the mind is so deliciously supple."
—Eromena the Mind Render
m20117.title: Thought Distortion

m20118.flavor:
"There are always more like you."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen
m20118.title: Undead Servant

m20119.flavor:
"Don't think of it as selling your soul. It's more like you're bequeathing it to me."
—Vilis, Broker of Blood
m20119.title: Unholy Indenture

m20120.flavor: "This place suits me: craven authorities and plentiful prey."
m20120.title: Vampire of the Dire Moon

m20121.flavor: "Try to steal from me and I'll add your skull to my collection."
m20121.title: Vengeful Warchief

m20122.flavor: "You can sign, or you can spend your life imagining what might have been yours."
m20122.title: Vilis, Broker of Blood

m20123.flavor: "Yarok's nightmares lurk and wait Where dark despair is near at hand." —Lament for Bala Ged, stanza 3
m20123.title: Yarok's Fenlurker

m20124.flavor: She learned a tragic lesson that day: even the purest can be corrupted when the heart's emotions are twisted.
m20124.title: Act of Treason

m20130.flavor:
"There's plenty of fire to go around."
—Chandra Nalaar
m20130.title: Chandra's Outrage

m20132.flavor: "I've lit most everything on fire—trees, rocks, even the water. Now it's time to burn the clouds."
m20132.title: Chandra's Spitfire

m20134.flavor: "I love digging. It gives me lots of time to think about how much I love digging."
m20134.title: Destructive Digger

m20135.flavor:
"Yes, it's huge and strong and breathes fire. But we're smart!"
—Tadith the Wise, last words
m20135.title: Dragon Mage

m20136.flavor:
"Spread out, you idiots! Spread out!"
—Marsden, party leader, last words
m20136.title: Drakuseth, Maw of Flames

m20137.flavor: Not every job in the goblin army is glamorous. Actually, no job in the goblin army is glamorous.
m20137.title: Ember Hauler

m20138.flavor:
"The best way to learn from a book on pyromancy is to burn it."
—Jaya Ballard
m20138.title: Fire Elemental

m20139.flavor:
"I have calculated that a dragon in flight, in a single strafing run, can cover an area of—"
—Thaedus the Clever, last words
m20139.title: Flame Sweep

m20140.flavor:
"I'm afraid your dinner got a little . . . overcooked."
—Marlan Farthwald, innkeeper
m20140.title: Fry

m20142.flavor: "I opens my mouth to catches the bugs!"
m20142.title: Goblin Bird-Grabber

m20144.flavor: "I am but a humble traveler. I have no taste for sneakery nor thiefiness."
m20144.title: Goblin Smuggler

m20145.flavor:
"No shirt, no shoes, no service."
—Marketplace sign
m20145.title: Infuriate

m20146.flavor: Keldon raiders' spoils are limited to what their colos can carry. No matter the value, the rest goes up in smoke.
m20146.title: Keldon Raider

m20147.flavor: She swings with the ease of flowing lava and hits with the force of a meteor.
m20147.title: Lavakin Brawler

m20149.flavor: Rage is the culmination of an accelerating cycle of anger and violence that feeds itself in battle, spreading like a flame from one warrior to another.
m20149.title: Maniacal Rage

m20150.flavor:
"Stand still and try not to look like prey!"
—Skerk Hobnett, wilderness guide
m20150.title: Marauding Raptor

m20152.flavor: Their loyalty is not to any master, but to the pack.
m20152.title: Pack Mastiff

m20153.flavor:
"Surely it won't notice if I take—"
—Theria the Sly, last words
m20153.title: Rapacious Dragon

m20155.flavor:
"Before they can go to their final rest, the wicked must be purified by fire."
—Harra the Adjudicator
m20155.title: Reduce to Ashes

m20156.flavor: It's in the nature of fire to grow.
m20156.title: Repeated Reverberation

m20157.flavor: Dinosaurs rarely understand the idea of boundaries between the wild and the urban landscape.
m20157.title: Ripscale Predator

m20158.flavor:
"Keep your flammables out of reach."
—Kerin, watch sergeant
m20158.title: Scampering Scorcher

m20159.flavor:
"Yes, she can be a nuisance. But at least my tea never gets cold."
—Marlan Farthwald, innkeeper
m20159.title: Scorch Spitter

m20160.flavor: "I love this thing! It's my best invention since the boulderfist gauntlet!"
m20160.title: Shock

m20161.flavor:
"You will kneel before me, even if I have to split the earth under your feet!"
—Ash Kronor, Keldon warlord
m20161.title: Tectonic Rift

m20163.flavor: The cage is a crucible for the rage that builds inside, refining it into something pure and terrible.
m20163.title: Uncaged Fury

m20164.flavor: Sathros turned his restraints to revenge.
m20164.title: Unchained Berserker

m20166.flavor: "Many have walked here, but there is only one trail I seek."
m20166.title: Brightwood Tracker

m20168.flavor:
"The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind."
—Ramal, sage of Westgate
m20168.title: Centaur Courser

m20170.flavor: Nylea's sacred lynx guards those who honor the Nessian Wood and hunts those who don't.
m20170.title: Feral Invocation

m20171.flavor: The strongest pack has the fiercest pups.
m20171.title: Ferocious Pup

m20174.flavor: Within a mile of the woodland, you will feel her eyes upon you. Within its borders, you will feel her blade.
m20174.title: Greenwood Sentinel

m20175.flavor:
"Shed your faded husk! Emerge sleeker and stronger!"
—Tyris, fauna shaman
m20175.title: Growth Cycle

m20176.flavor: "Grief and rage and nightmares fade Where hope and comfort make their stand." —Lament for Bala Ged, stanza 4
m20176.title: Healer of the Glade

m20177.flavor: He and his pack sing the same mournful song to the moon.
m20177.title: Howling Giant

m20178.flavor: "I am rooted in the life of all that thrives around me. You cannot move me."
m20178.title: Leafkin Druid

m20180.flavor:
"The living don't ever stay living, and the dead don't always stay dead."
—Jeddeg, philosopher of graves
m20180.title: Loaming Shaman

m20181.flavor:
"If a careless elf ends up caught in a spider's web, we must expect nature to take its course. Do not blame the spider for being a spider."
—Dellin Berting, Tolarian entomologist
m20181.title: Mammoth Spider

m20182.flavor: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.
m20182.title: Might of the Masses

m20183.flavor: The haunted blade shattered, and the geist drifted gratefully to the Blessed Sleep.
m20183.title: Natural End

m20184.flavor: It is an expert at culling individuals who stray too far from the herd.
m20184.title: Netcaster Spider

m20185.flavor: A strong leader means a growing pack.
m20185.title: Nightpack Ambusher

m20186.flavor:
"Forward! Until the horizon is ours!"
—Khemses, charioteer
m20186.title: Overcome

m20188.flavor:
"Even the pterodon, who chases the clouds from its skies, must bow to the great forest below."
—Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer
m20188.title: Plummet

m20189.flavor: "Little flower twirl and bloom, arise from this your rocky tomb. Little warrior slash and brawl, be born again to free us all."
m20189.title: Pulse of Murasa

m20190.flavor: "You should have seen the look on both their faces." —Morkamp, Lambholt innkeeper
m20190.title: Rabid Bite

m20191.flavor: "Awake, and lift your faces to the sun."
m20191.title: Season of Growth

m20192.flavor:
Thakolides the Mighty
Slayer of minotaurs
Vanquisher of giants
Killed by a scorpion
—Inscription on an Akroan grave
m20192.title: Sedge Scorpion

m20193.flavor:
"In times of need, the forest creates its own protectors."
—Vivien Reid
m20193.title: Shared Summons

m20195.flavor: The apes of Yavimaya draw strength from the spirits of their ancestors.
m20195.title: Silverback Shaman

m20196.flavor:
"Tread too hard in the forest and it will tread on you in return."
—Vivien Reid
m20196.title: Thicket Crasher

m20197.flavor: It cares more about preserving the herd's territory than about preserving itself.
m20197.title: Thrashing Brontodon

m20201.flavor: Roots reach deep, and sometimes they tap into things better left undisturbed.
m20201.title: Vorstclaw

m20202.flavor:
"When the forest walks, it's too late to run."
—Horent, Khalni druid
m20202.title: Wakeroot Elemental

m20205.flavor: "Every footfall on the forest floor is a heartbeat sending strength into my veins."
m20205.title: Woodland Champion

m20206.flavor: "With each knight that rode out from the bone-white keep, the queen's soldiers felt their courage failing." —Krinnea, Siege of the Bone Spire
m20206.title: Corpse Knight

m20207.flavor: The destruction of a wildfire with the tenacity of a jungle vine.
m20207.title: Creeping Trailblazer

m20208.flavor: All the birds of the skies are the spirit's brood, gathered for safety under its wings.
m20208.title: Empyrean Eagle

m20209.flavor:
"Alone, it's a fortification. At the head of its troops, it's a battering ram."
—Skerk Hobnett, wilderness guide
m20209.title: Ironroot Warlord

m20211.flavor: "The pen is mightier than the crown."
m20211.title: Kethis, the Hidden Hand

m20212.flavor: "The raging gale fans the flames of righteous wrath."
m20212.title: Kykar, Wind's Fury

m20213.flavor: "I strike in the same place as many times as necessary."
m20213.title: Lightning Stormkin

m20214.flavor:
"The heroes of the past nourish our spirits by their example—and nourish our crops by their decay."
—Jeddeg, philosopher of graves
m20214.title: Moldervine Reclamation

m20215.flavor:
"What he doesn't burn, he smashes."
—Captain Wellis, ogre wrangler
m20215.title: Ogre Siegebreaker

m20217.flavor: "No, not ‘washed' ashore. It walked ashore." —Shafring Hulm, beachcomber
m20217.title: Risen Reef

m20220.flavor: "Yarok grieves within the waste Of Bala Ged's corrupted land." —Lament for Bala Ged, stanza 1
m20220.title: Yarok, the Desecrated

m20221.flavor:
"I know its lightness, for I have seen it fly. I know its weight, for I have seen it strike."
—Brigone, soldier of Meletis
m20221.title: Anvilwrought Raptor

m20223.flavor: "There's only one way to be sure it's really dead."
m20223.title: Colossus Hammer

m20225.flavor:
"I see it taunting me whenever I close my eyes."
—Nayrex Slipfinger, master thief
m20225.title: Diviner's Lockbox

m20227.flavor:
"Best bury them right. We don't want any gruesome encores."
—Constable Trosk
m20227.title: Grafdigger's Cage

m20230.flavor:
"Locks want to be opened, and treasure wants to be free."
—Nayrex Slipfinger, master thief
m20230.title: Manifold Key

m20231.flavor: A sharp axe solves most problems.
m20231.title: Marauder's Axe

m20232.flavor: The impact sent the soldiers scattering—then something came out of the crater.
m20232.title: Meteor Golem

m20234.flavor:
"Good! Now put it with the other widdle bunnies."
—Sargis Haz, artificer
m20234.title: Pattern Matcher

m20235.flavor: Even its shadow is a dazzling rainbow.
m20235.title: Prismite

m20236.flavor:
"The last blast is the biggest."
—Sargis Haz, artificer
m20236.title: Retributive Wand

m20237.flavor:
"The next model should be able to achieve a rescue without self-destruction."
—Sargis Haz, artificer
m20237.title: Salvager of Ruin

m20238.flavor: With five lenses on its "head," it sees the world in a range of colors beyond ordinary perception.
m20238.title: Scuttlemutt

m20239.flavor:
"The world is already run by all manner of machines. One day, they'll remind us of that fact."
—Sargis Haz, artificer
m20239.title: Steel Overseer

m20240.flavor: The sculptor, like most artists, put his heart and soul into his work. But the newly awakened golem decided it wanted its creator's other, more tangible parts.
m20240.title: Stone Golem

m20241.flavor:
"The artificer assured me that the vial is strong enough to contain the dragon's breath. I just need to make sure to throw it far enough."
—Kunh Mei, last words
m20241.title: Vial of Dragonfire

m20244.flavor: Only when you've given up the search will the caves yield their secrets.
m20244.title: Cryptic Caves

m20246.flavor: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.
m20246.title: Evolving Wilds

m20284.flavor: "Now is not the time for your light to fade."
m20284.title: Savannah Sage

m20287.flavor:
"It soars on the winds of dreams."
—Mu Yanling
m20287.title: Celestial Messenger

m20288.flavor: "They come to drink, to bathe, and—I believe—to play."
m20288.title: Waterkin Shaman

m20291.flavor: "I have no patience for sipping blood from crystal goblets. I want to bite and tear."
m20291.title: Savage Gorger

m20292.flavor: "My people serve the dragon Kolaghan, but I give my blood for a greater lord."
m20292.title: Sorin's Guide

m20293.flavor: "A whole life, full of memories and experience, love and sorrow, drained drop by drop into this bottle. Could any feast be more glorious?"
m20293.title: Thirsting Bloodlord

m20296.flavor:
"Whoever thought of making mobile volcanoes was a genius."
—Chandra Nalaar
m20296.title: Pyroclastic Elemental

m20297.flavor:
"Fire is always dancing, leaping and whirling, seeking more fuel. It never rests, so why should I?"
—Chandra Nalaar
m20297.title: Wildfire Elemental

m20300.flavor:
"I think it's trying to tell us that the forest is angry."
—Vivien Reid
m20300.title: Gnarlback Rhino

m20301.flavor:
"Regardless of where they come from, crocs are usually able to find their way home. For this one, home is me."
—Vivien Reid
m20301.title: Vivien's Crocodile

m20303.flavor: Headquartered at the Bastion of the Honorable, the soldiers of Ghirapur are charged with the task of keeping peace in the city.
m20303.title: Bastion Enforcer

m20304.flavor: In the cloudy skies and dim light of autumn, a flash of white wings is a reminder that better times lie ahead.
m20304.title: Concordia Pegasus

m20305.flavor: "You two, cover the alley! You, with me! Eyes on windows, balconies, and rooftops. Who knows what a fish-octopus-crab can do!"
m20305.title: Haazda Officer

m20306.flavor: In times of unrest, the crowd is eager for the comfort of strong convictions.
m20306.title: Impassioned Orator

m20307.flavor: Her mount's hollow crest can produce a trumpeting warning that carries for miles, summoning more knights to her aid.
m20307.title: Imperial Outrider

m20308.flavor:
"We need to block the exits from the plaza! What's big, heavy, and available?"
—Gideon Jura
m20308.title: Ironclad Krovod

m20309.flavor: A hunter in the city requires the utmost cunning to survive. It must pounce only if the kill is certain, and leave the remains where no one will see.
m20309.title: Prowling Caracal

m20310.flavor: She watches over the city just as Serra watches over all.
m20310.title: Serra's Guardian

m20311.flavor: "As the knight struggled to stand, his squire took up his blade. The foe advanced not a single step." —Krinnea, Siege of the Bone Spire
m20311.title: Show of Valor

m20312.flavor:
"The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!"
—General Avitora
m20312.title: Siege Mastodon

m20313.flavor: "Your death will be a balm, your passing a welcome revision, and all will sigh with peace to know of your demise."
m20313.title: Take Vengeance

m20315.flavor: The merfolk know every contour of their coral homes; each reef is a garden in times of peace, and a refuge and fortress in times of war.
m20315.title: Coral Merfolk

m20316.flavor:
"Only when I saw my enemy walk through all my defenses, untouchable as the moon in the sky, did I truly know what it is to be afraid."
—King Ixes
m20316.title: Phantom Warrior

m20317.flavor: "Safe passage requires only a simple answer to a simple question, traveler."
m20317.title: Riddlemaster Sphinx

m20318.flavor: Foul-tempered, poorly trained, and mule-stubborn, the drake is the perfect test of the master's will.
m20318.title: Snapping Drake

m20319.flavor: At night, bats will feast on whatever is drawn to lanterns and streetlights.
m20319.title: Bartizan Bats

m20320.flavor:
"They are gentle herbivores, despite their size. Approach cautiously, and hum a tune to let them know you mean no harm."
—Vivien Reid
m20320.title: Bogstomper

m20321.flavor: "Writhing tendrils of darkness stitched him back together. Though his will and body both were broken, the necromancer's magic would not let him rest." —Krinnea, Siege of the Bone Spire
m20321.title: Dark Remedy

m20322.flavor:
"If we've run out of warm bodies, then cold bodies will have to do."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen
m20322.title: Disentomb

m20323.flavor: It glides on silent wings across the midnight sky, and a dread host rises to follow.
m20323.title: Gravewaker

m20324.flavor:
"Soul, flesh, even eyes—none of these are strictly necessary for deadly precision."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen
m20324.title: Skeleton Archer

m20325.flavor: "All your steel won't protect you if your will is weak."
m20325.title: Sorin's Thirst

m20327.flavor:
"What does it mean when the dead feed on the dead? When no new life emerges, but only more death? Is it not an endless spiral into annihilation?"
—Jeddeg, philosopher of graves
m20327.title: Walking Corpse

m20328.flavor:
"Compared to the hunger of the fires within the earth, the appetite of a mere wurm is nothing."
—Phelgis Ojin, Keral Keep acolyte
m20328.title: Engulfing Eruption

m20329.flavor: "I spent some time in the Legion, but I'm done taking orders all day."
m20329.title: Fearless Halberdier

m20330.flavor: What he lacks in patience, intelligence, empathy, lucidity, hygiene, ability to follow orders, self-regard, and discernible skills, he makes up for in sheer chaotic violence.
m20330.title: Goblin Assailant

m20331.flavor: The bellow of a minotaur always translates to "charge."
m20331.title: Hostile Minotaur

m20332.flavor: Their fires burn quietly, allowing the phoenixes to glide silently through the canyon.
m20332.title: Immortal Phoenix

m20334.flavor: Joining a guild, even the Gruul, would mean giving up some of his independence. He'd rather smash what he wants to smash.
m20334.title: Rubblebelt Recluse

m20335.flavor:
"It's just playing with us, Marsden."
—Dafynne the Radiant, last words
m20335.title: Shivan Dragon

m20336.flavor:
"That's no ordinary eruption!"
—Grazlash Stonehold, last words
m20336.title: Volcanic Dragon

m20337.flavor:
"Approach from behind. That way, if it does charge, at least you aren't in front of it."
—Vivien Reid
m20337.title: Aggressive Mammoth

m20338.flavor: The spikes of bone protruding from its hide serve primarily as protection, but as they accumulate bits of foliage from the surrounding forest, they also provide camouflage.
m20338.title: Bristling Boar

m20339.flavor: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.
m20339.title: Canopy Spider

m20340.flavor:
"Even the smallest creatures are fierce in defense of their own territory."
—Vivien Reid
m20340.title: Frilled Sandwalla

m20341.flavor:
"When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?"
—Dionus, elvish archdruid
m20341.title: Oakenform

m20342.flavor:
"Friend and foe alike are irresistibly drawn to its beauty—the good, to their lasting reward, and the evil, to their brief and painful regret."
—Vivien Reid
m20342.title: Prized Unicorn

m20343.flavor: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.
m20343.title: Titanic Growth

m20344.flavor: "I sing to the branches, and they reach to the sky. I sing to the leaves, and they open to the sun. I sing to the roots, and they dig their fingers deep. I sing the song that creation sung."
m20344.title: Woodland Mystic

eld2.flavor: A faerie's glee at her trove quickly fades to contentment, then to boredom, then to an urge to steal more.
eld2.title: All That Glitters

eld4.flavor: "Even when hope is but a small flame fighting the night, I will serve the absent king."
eld4.title: Ardenvale Paladin

eld5.flavor: In a castle that prizes loyalty above all, the bond between knight and griffin is unmatched.
eld5.title: Dizzying Swoop

eld6.flavor: At the market, no one heeded Hilda's frantic mooing. The fae curse was turning out even worse than she had feared.
eld6.title: Bartered Cow

eld7.flavor: Sometimes a gentle slipper can travel where an armored boot's been denied.
eld7.title: Beloved Princess

eld10.flavor:
"They have forsaken their vows. The edict of the Circle demands their voices be silenced."
—Syr Tasdale, knight of Ardenvale
eld10.title: Deafening Silence

eld11.flavor: No one is so lost that a faerie can't find them.
eld11.title: Gift of the Fae

eld12.flavor: "The fox grinned. ‘How about a bet, dragon? If I win, the skies are mine.' After he stopped laughing, the dragon agreed." —Tales of the Fae
eld12.title: Flutterfox

eld13.flavor: "To the king, to the Circle, and to the realm! And to not dying."
eld13.title: Fortifying Provisions

eld14.flavor: "What size advantage? They never even see me coming."
eld14.title: Chop Down

eld15.flavor: Fate will decide whether it's a bed or a tomb.
eld15.title: Glass Casket

eld18.flavor: "Let's begin this conversation again, and this time you will only listen."
eld18.title: Hushbringer

eld19.flavor: "What good is loyalty to the crown if we are not also in service to those less fortunate? I fight for all of us."
eld19.title: Knight of the Keep

eld20.flavor: "Until my last breath, I will defend the realm."
eld20.title: Linden, the Steadfast Queen

eld22.flavor: For good or ill, most fae can't resist meddling in the adventures of any knight they meet.
eld22.title: Mysterious Pathlighter

eld23.flavor: "With the drum of hooves and a flash of blades, the monster's terrifying roar changed to a cry of fear." —Legend of the Gilded Knights
eld23.title: Outflank

eld24.flavor:
"I wrote these tales with a quill made from a griffin's feather. And the winning of that feather is quite a tale itself."
—Chulane, Teller of Tales
eld24.title: Prized Griffin

eld25.flavor:
"If you're as loyal as you claim, now is the time to show it."
—Queen Linden of Ardenvale
eld25.title: Rally for the Throne

eld27.flavor: Syr Damon looked at the dragon and saw the faces of every innocent it had devoured. Suddenly, his sword blazed like the sun.
eld27.title: Righteousness

eld30.flavor: Tempered by fire and united in virtue, the knights of Ardenvale fight with a single, unbreakable will.
eld30.title: Silverflame Ritual

eld31.flavor: Beacons along the borderlands are lit at any incursion from the wilds.
eld31.title: On Alert

eld32.flavor: "The realm must never yield to the chaos of the wilds."
eld32.title: Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw

eld33.flavor: "At least up here I have some peace and quiet."
eld33.title: Trapped in the Tower

eld34.flavor:
"Be careful, dear. Some people deserve their curses."
—Marawen, barrow witch
eld34.title: True Love's Kiss

eld35.flavor: "May this blade guide you on your great journey, as it did me on mine."
eld35.title: Venerable Knight

eld36.flavor: Every Ardenvale aspirant must step through the flame. Their honor determines whether they burn or shine.
eld36.title: Worthy Knight

eld37.flavor:
"In the wilds, your true training will begin."
—Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw
eld37.title: Youthful Knight

eld38.flavor: A true puppet master has no need for strings.
eld38.title: Bring to Life

eld41.flavor: Castle Vantress has no locks on its doors, but interlopers rarely make it past the foyer.
eld41.title: Corridor Monitor

eld42.flavor: "If you're in our home, we expect you to mind your manners."
eld42.title: Didn't Say Please

eld45.flavor: History may be written by the triumphant, but it's often rewritten by the troublesome.
eld45.title: Faerie Vandal

eld47.flavor: That gnat was still hovering by the venison, and now both looked delicious.
eld47.title: Frogify

eld48.flavor: His name is spoken only in whispers—but he hears just the same.
eld48.title: Gadwick, the Wizened

eld50.flavor: The boundary between real and imaginary is as thin as the page, and just as easily torn.
eld50.title: Into the Story

eld53.flavor: Merfolk curiosity usually has dire consequences, but rarely for the merfolk.
eld53.title: Venture Deeper

eld55.flavor:
"Share your darkest secret and the Mirror will reveal your soul's essence."
—Ceri, royal mirrorkeeper
eld55.title: Mirrormade

eld56.flavor: The fae raised the turtle from a tiny hatchling. They taught it whom to ferry—and whom to drown.
eld56.title: Mistford River Turtle

eld57.flavor: They comb the shallows of Lochmere for relics of a bygone era. And if they happen upon a lone traveler, all the better.
eld57.title: Moonlit Scavengers

eld58.flavor: "Poor, lost mage. Your feet are on land, yet you're in over your head, aren't you?"
eld58.title: Mystical Dispute

eld59.flavor:
"Sometimes the hardest choice is between two wonders."
—Gadwick, the Wizened
eld59.title: Opt

eld62.flavor:
"Virtue is virtue, whatever the heart that nurtures it."
—Malacan, Vantress exile
eld62.title: Run Away Together

eld63.flavor: Ask a merfolk even a simple question and the answer is a journey far beyond the known.
eld63.title: Sage of the Falls

eld64.flavor: His sword sounded like a silver chime on the glass jar, and the sprite laughed with delight.
eld64.title: So Tiny

eld65.flavor:
"If we didn't guard our secrets, they wouldn't remain secrets for long."
—Gadwick, the Wizened
eld65.title: Steelgaze Griffin

eld66.flavor: Denizens of the wilds don't always seek to harm intruders. Sometimes they simply misplace them.
eld66.title: Stolen by the Fae

eld68.flavor: "Humans are so forgetful. Every page I steal becomes a secret they can't remember."
eld68.title: Tome Raider

eld70.flavor: Rowan and Will exchanged a baffled glance. Could the stag in the vision lead them to their father?
eld70.title: Unexplained Vision

eld72.flavor: "Someone knows where the king is. They can't expect to keep it a secret from us."
eld72.title: Vantress Paladin

eld73.flavor: She yearned to walk on dry land so she might take her vengeance there.
eld73.title: Wishful Merfolk

eld74.flavor: It was built by the Witch of Lochmere. Most of the wishes it grants are its own.
eld74.title: Witching Well

eld75.flavor: Mourning shifts seamlessly to celebration as she chooses her next suitor.
eld75.title: Ayara, First of Locthwain

eld76.flavor: "My secret ingredient? Well, I can't tell you that. But here's a hint. It's not love."
eld76.title: Bake into a Pie

eld77.flavor:
"Taste the sweetness, breath for breath.
Keep the balance, death for death."
—Barrow witch incantation
eld77.title: Barrow Witches

eld78.flavor: Locthwain knights take pride in being the last ones standing in a fight or on a dance floor.
eld78.title: Belle of the Brawl

eld79.flavor: The Blacklances travel deep into the wilds, sometimes for years at a time, in search of the lost Cauldron of Eternity.
eld79.title: Blacklance Paragon

eld80.flavor: "The faerie plucked an acorn off the ground. One knight's quest was about to come to a bitter end." —Tales of the Fae
eld80.title: Bog Naughty

eld81.flavor: Every day the cat returns to kill the same mouse, which sinks again into the cauldron's brew.
eld81.title: Cauldron Familiar

eld85.flavor: The dragon had a lot of things going through his mind that day. He didn't expect a sword to be one of them.
eld85.title: Epic Downfall

eld86.flavor: "Lord Rankle will see you now—all he asks is a small token of tribute."
eld86.title: Eye Collector

eld87.flavor:
"Even as we mourn the last, we look to the next with joy. Hopefully, my new suitor will bring the Cauldron home."
—Ayara, First of Locthwain
eld87.title: Festive Funeral

eld89.flavor: Those who say you only live once have never been touched by the Cauldron of Eternity.
eld89.title: Forever Young

eld92.flavor:
"Another angry mob? When will they learn to leave me be?"
—Terryn, Edgewall outcast
eld92.title: Lash of Thorns

eld93.flavor: "I will find the king if I have to ride from summer to winter and back again."
eld93.title: Locthwain Paladin

eld94.flavor: Even death cannot diminish the persistence of the knights of Locthwain.
eld94.title: Lost Legion

eld95.flavor: He has slain a dozen witches, luring each with a promise of fresh children's bones.
eld95.title: Malevolent Noble

eld96.flavor: In the wilds, the ravens steal far more than baubles.
eld96.title: Memory Theft

eld100.flavor: "If it has ears, it will dance to my tune."
eld100.title: Piper of the Swarm

eld103.flavor:
"Into amethyst, I pour
Envy's shadow, sorrow's gleam.
Lure the one whose scorn I bore
That I may hear one final scream."
—Barrow witch incantation
eld103.title: Reave Soul

eld104.flavor: Syr Tasdale declared that he never wanted to see the witch Ygretta again. Her familiars quickly granted his request.
eld104.title: Revenge of Ravens

eld105.flavor: "My quest? Why, to marry Ayara. Or die trying."
eld105.title: Curry Favor

eld106.flavor:
"Imagine having your skeleton extracted through your ear, one bone at a time."
—Corliss the Wanderer
eld106.title: Specter's Shriek

eld108.flavor:
"Murder clad in crimson beauty,
An end to life and love and duty."
—Barrow witch incantation
eld108.title: Tempting Witch

eld109.flavor: "Some are born to greatness. You were born to scrub greatness's floors."
eld109.title: Wicked Guardian

eld111.flavor: The hex swept through the village, its citizens falling one by one.
eld111.title: Witch's Vengeance

eld112.flavor: The giant had heard of locks, but he had yet to discover a door he couldn't open.
eld112.title: Barge In

eld113.flavor:
"Build a moat. If we're lucky, it can't swim."
—Syr Branigan, knight of Ardenvale
eld113.title: Bloodhaze Wolverine

eld114.flavor:
"You think these walls will protect you? My, you have a dim view of the power of the wilds."
—Marawen, barrow witch
eld114.title: Blow Your House Down

eld115.flavor: Not every tale ends in glory.
eld115.title: Stomp

eld117.flavor: "For every scar I've received, I've given ten back."
eld117.title: Burning-Yard Trainer

eld118.flavor: "The deal was struck and the favor had been done. And so, under the cover of night, the debt was paid." —Tales of the Fae
eld118.title: Claim the Firstborn

eld119.flavor: "After the death of her mother, Cassia found that things that appear fragile can be very strong indeed." —Beyond the Great Henge
eld119.title: Crystal Slipper

eld121.flavor: "The king would die for the realm. I would not hesitate to do the same for him."
eld121.title: Embereth Paladin

eld122.flavor: "Courage is the only shield I need."
eld122.title: Battle Display

eld123.flavor: Knights who excel in tournaments sometimes underestimate threats beyond the realm.
eld123.title: Ferocity of the Wilds

eld125.flavor: "Just tell us how many you want and get out of the way."
eld125.title: Fires of Invention

eld126.flavor: Giants believe that tossing redcaps at knights is the best way to deal with both.
eld126.title: Fling

eld127.flavor: The greatest challenge isn't the stifling heat but the crushing weight of those who failed before.
eld127.title: Irencrag Feat

eld128.flavor: "Fear of fire is a sensible instinct. If I were you, I'd be terrified."
eld128.title: Irencrag Pyromancer

eld129.flavor:
"Life is a tournament that rewards the bold."
—Syr Layne, knight of Embereth
eld129.title: Joust

eld130.flavor: "Gather round and tell me all from the courts and castles."
eld130.title: Mad Ratter

eld131.flavor: "Buying old, worn-out junk. Selling marvels of real value."
eld131.title: Haggle

eld132.flavor: Knights kept returning from Ogre's Pass wearing nothing but bruises, so they decided to just pretend it was on their side.
eld132.title: Ogre Errant

eld134.flavor: Many tales of redcap terror begin with two simple things: bloodlust and stolen steel.
eld134.title: Raging Redcap

eld135.flavor: At first, Syr Fenwick scoffed when he saw his opponents for the final match.
eld135.title: Redcap Melee

eld136.flavor:
"I admire their courage as much as I despise their savagery."
—Syr Carah, the Bold
eld136.title: Redcap Raiders

eld139.flavor: As the blaze raced toward her, Syr Ameril closed her eyes and pictured Castle Ardenvale so her last thoughts would be of home.
eld139.title: Scorching Dragonfire

eld140.flavor: It emerged from the coldest depths of Lochmere only to face the fires of Irencrag.
eld140.title: Searing Barrage

eld141.flavor:
"The gleam of rubies and my brothers and sisters by my side . . . what more could I want?"
—Brognold the Third
eld141.title: Seven Dwarves

eld142.flavor: The ogre crashed through the massive door. The winged folios scattered like frightened birds.
eld142.title: Skullknocker Ogre

eld143.flavor: The purest virtue burns brighter than the sun and hotter than dragonfire.
eld143.title: Slaying Fire

eld145.flavor: "Duty and honor are reasons enough, but beating you will also be a pleasure."
eld145.title: Syr Carah, the Bold

eld146.flavor:
"Remember all the great heroes who were careful and never did anything risky? Me neither."
—Syr Carah, the Bold
eld146.title: Thrill of Possibility

eld147.flavor: A dwarf's grudge runs deeper than the mountains' roots.
eld147.title: Torbran, Thane of Red Fell

eld148.flavor:
"I would rather cast myself into the abyss than let my blood stain the cap of those monsters."
—Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw
eld148.title: Weaselback Redcap

eld150.flavor: "It's gingerbread, like Mother makes. What is there to be afraid of?"
eld150.title: Treats to Share

eld151.flavor: "Warmth. Safety. A fully-stocked larder. You'll find nothing like Edgewall Keep in the wilds, I promise you that!"
eld151.title: Edgewall Innkeeper

eld153.flavor:
"A keen eye and steady hand are essential for defeating most foes, including hunger."
—Syr Grenphire, knight of Garenbrig
eld153.title: Fell the Pheasant

eld154.flavor: While the realm has laws, in the wilds there are other ways of balancing power.
eld154.title: Fierce Witchstalker

eld155.flavor: The middle blade was just right.
eld155.title: Welcome Home

eld156.flavor: Countless knights of Garenbrig owe their lives to his peerless craftsmanship.
eld156.title: Shield's Might

eld158.flavor:
"Find him a weapon as big as his dreams."
—Yorvo, lord of Garenbrig
eld158.title: Garenbrig Squire

eld159.flavor: They look tasty, but best to plant them.
eld159.title: Giant Opportunity

eld162.flavor: He ate them out of house and home and shed and barn and flock and herd.
eld162.title: Insatiable Appetite

eld163.flavor:
"Only the lion knows more stories than I do."
—Chulane, Teller of Tales
eld163.title: Keeper of Fables

eld165.flavor: His mind chose solitude, but his heart disagreed.
eld165.title: Heart's Desire

eld167.flavor: The elves remember every secret path from the days when they ruled the realm.
eld167.title: Oakhame Adversary

eld173.flavor: "Long after the magic wore off, the mice still dreamed of glorious galloping." —Tales of the Fae
eld173.title: Return to Nature

eld174.flavor: "Old battlefields make great gardens. So rich from the blood of the fallen."
eld174.title: Seasonal Ritual

eld176.flavor: After years of taunts and aerial assaults from Rankle's minions, the witches of Maraleaf Forest acquired new familiars.
eld176.title: Sporecap Spider

eld177.flavor: "Words are pointless. It's what you do with your hammer that counts."
eld177.title: Syr Faren, the Hengehammer

eld178.flavor: He realized a bit late that he was supposed to plant the magic beans.
eld178.title: Tall as a Beanstalk

eld180.flavor: "Right now you are a feeble stick, but I will help you grow some rings."
eld180.title: Oaken Boon

eld183.flavor: "This one was wearing shoes made of glass. She'll be no ordinary prey."
eld183.title: Wildwood Tracker

eld184.flavor: "The monster was gaining on them. Twice it had found them. There was only one place left to hide." —Tales of the Fae
eld184.title: Wolf's Quarry

eld187.flavor: In the end, death usually has its way.
eld187.title: Doom Foretold

eld189.flavor: The guards kindled the hearth and locked the door to Ellwen's chamber. By morning, the fire was out and Ellwen was gone.
eld189.title: Escape to the Wilds

eld190.flavor: Its wide-reaching roots draw more than water.
eld190.title: Faeburrow Elder

eld192.flavor: "Does it matter what it is? Take it and be grateful!"
eld192.title: Grumgully, the Generous

eld193.flavor:
"I agreed to light his way as long as he always had my back."
—Squill, Mistford pixie
eld193.title: Improbable Alliance

eld194.flavor: "I fight for my daughter, who may not set foot on a battlefield for many years. Remember who you fight for."
eld194.title: Inspiring Veteran

eld196.flavor: Neither hostile nor friendly, pixies flit through the forest seeking the treasures of the wilds.
eld196.title: Maraleaf Pixie

eld200.flavor: None of the other villagers dare venture into the wilds, so she feeds the whole hamlet herself.
eld200.title: Savvy Hunter

eld202.flavor:
"A traditional lance is fine for the Burning Yard, but in the wilds you need a nastier bite."
—Kenver, Embereth weaponsmith
eld202.title: Steelclaw Lance

eld203.flavor: "As she reached the pinnacle, lightning flashed and her eyes blazed with newfound power." —Legend of the Gilded Knights
eld203.title: Stormfist Crusader

eld204.flavor:
"A good steed will carry you home. A great steed will carry you to glory."
—Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw
eld204.title: Wandermare

eld208.flavor:
"Headed to the wilds? Beware the dead riders who serve the Shadow Queen."
—Scalan, Edgewall innkeeper
eld208.title: Deathless Knight

eld209.flavor: Nothing remains of his foes but the gripping story of their downfall.
eld209.title: Elite Headhunter

eld210.flavor: He endured the white-hot blaze of the Circle and the sweltering heat of the Irencrag, and he emerged victorious.
eld210.title: Fireborn Knight

eld211.flavor: Despite its ferocity, its favor can be won with a gift of something it's never seen before.
eld211.title: Loch Dragon

eld213.flavor:
"He has strength and courage—just way, way too much of both."
—Syr Faren, the Hengehammer
eld213.title: Rampart Smasher

eld214.flavor: "Respect the wilds? Certainly. Fear them? No."
eld214.title: Resolute Rider

eld215.flavor: While humans hear only a deafening roar, the fae hear music of breathtaking beauty.
eld215.title: Thunderous Snapper

eld216.flavor: Some are annoyed by the constant ticking as they clean the cobbles, but to the castle custodians, there's no sweeter sound.
eld216.title: Clockwork Servant

eld217.flavor: "The Northern Beacon flared, and even before the drawbridge finished its descent, the knights charged out." —Legend of the Gilded Knights
eld217.title: Crashing Drawbridge

eld219.flavor: The unlabeled vial was not vanilla extract after all.
eld219.title: Gingerbrute

eld221.flavor: Everything that inhabits Garenbrig is affected by the wild magic flowing through the Great Henge.
eld221.title: Henge Walker

eld223.flavor: "The strings were gone, but he still felt the pull of invisible forces tugging at his mind." —Beyond the Great Henge
eld223.title: Inquisitive Puppet

eld224.flavor:
"Don't let it fool you. Many of us got our first scars from Syr Nobody."
—Syr Layne, knight of Embereth
eld224.title: Jousting Dummy

eld225.flavor: "As the traitor hurried across the courtyard, its eyes snapped open. It was time to pay the queen a visit." —Beyond the Great Henge
eld225.title: Locthwain Gargoyle

eld226.flavor: Syr Branigan always remembered to kiss his good luck charm, having lost his foot to wolverines the last time he forgot.
eld226.title: Lucky Clover

eld227.flavor: It frequently predicts imminent death by devouring.
eld227.title: Prophet of the Peak

eld228.flavor: "It wandered slowly across the landscape, calling out in its lonely voice, but no other castles answered its cries." —Beyond the Great Henge
eld228.title: Roving Keep

eld229.flavor: "It's a witch's trick, this cauldron full of pain. I wouldn't dump it on any but the wicked."
eld229.title: Scalding Cauldron

eld230.flavor: "The young squire gripped her sword as the clanking stranger emerged. It was no knight that had come to challenge her." —Beyond the Great Henge
eld230.title: Shambling Suit

eld231.flavor:
"Accursed scarecrow! Sending folk in every direction is the same as sending them nowhere at all."
—Corliss the Wanderer
eld231.title: Signpost Scarecrow

eld232.flavor: "Reynald wished for an army to sweep away his enemies. The fae king smiled." —Beyond the Great Henge
eld232.title: Sorcerer's Broom

eld234.flavor: "Though long forgotten, the wheel continued to turn, spinning fate from a dusty attic." —Beyond the Great Henge
eld234.title: Spinning Wheel

eld235.flavor: Cast out of Garenbrig for his crimes, Ennor turned to fae magic to fashion the perfect weapon for his revenge.
eld235.title: Stonecoil Serpent

eld236.flavor: No weapon stays on the rack for long in the Burning Yard.
eld236.title: Weapon Rack

eld237.flavor: The wafting smells are both scrumptious and suspicious.
eld237.title: Witch's Oven

eld238.flavor: Without Ardenvale's loyalty, the realm would greedily devour itself.
eld238.title: Castle Ardenvale

eld239.flavor: Without Embereth's courage, the realm would falter and fall.
eld239.title: Castle Embereth

eld240.flavor: Without Garenbrig's strength, the realm would succumb to the wilds.
eld240.title: Castle Garenbrig

eld241.flavor: Without Locthwain's persistence, the realm would stagnate and die.
eld241.title: Castle Locthwain

eld242.flavor: Without Vantress's knowledge, the realm would lose itself in darkness.
eld242.title: Castle Vantress

eld244.flavor: From here, the path to anywhere may be found.
eld244.title: Fabled Passage

eld248.flavor: No one knows when the tournament began. All they know is that it will never end.
eld248.title: Tournament Grounds

eld305.flavor: The keen-eyed guardians of Ardenvale are ever on alert.
eld305.title: Garrison Griffin

eld306.flavor: "This sword is Sunrise. The other is Dawn. They mark the beginning of my days but the end of yours."
eld306.title: Rowan's Battleguard

eld310.flavor: They function as everything from assassins to jesters in the name of their fae king.
eld310.title: Oko's Accomplices

eld311.flavor: No matter the cruelty of Oko's jokes, he's always guaranteed the sycophant's laughter.
eld311.title: Bramblefort Fink

eld312.flavor:
"My advisors recommend I let them eat you."
—Oko
eld312.title: Oko's Hospitality

eld316.flavor: The throng flitted from castle to castle, leaving a trail of star-crossed love, damaging rumors, and missing heirlooms in their wake.
eld316.title: Faerie Formation

eld317.flavor: The indigo dragon gladly traded a bit of its hoard for everlasting moonlight.
eld317.title: Shimmer Dragon

eld318.flavor: "Fear not what's under the bed. The toys are watching." —Beyond the Great Henge
eld318.title: Workshop Elders

eld320.flavor:
"Hone the knife and mourn the least.
Three chimes to sound the sweet, grim feast."
—Barrow witch incantation
eld320.title: Taste of Death

eld321.flavor: "We fight with valor in our hearts and fire in our veins!"
eld321.title: Embereth Skyblazer

eld322.flavor: Many an ancient treasure has been reduced to jagged caltrops by its snapping jaws.
eld322.title: Steelbane Hydra

eld323.flavor: It will come to the defense of all wild things, from the shivering wren to the towering giant.
eld323.title: Thorn Mammoth

eld324.flavor: "Rankle's pranks are child's play. My games will topple kingdoms."
eld324.title: Alela, Artful Provocateur

eld328.flavor:
"By hoof, wing, or paw. For the realm!"
—Syr Gwyn, Hero of Ashvale
eld328.title: Knights' Charge

eld329.flavor: Transformed at his own wedding, he promptly ate the banquet, the gifts, and the guests.
eld329.title: Korvold, Fae-Cursed King

eld330.flavor: Squires throughout the realm aspire to her mix of panache and martial prowess.
eld330.title: Syr Gwyn, Hero of Ashvale

eld331.flavor: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.
eld331.title: Arcane Signet

eld333.flavor:
"Approach my tower on bended knee or depart from it as ash upon the wind."
—Gadwick, the Wizened
eld333.title: Command Tower

thb1.flavor:
"Dawn-kissed, he nourishes the golden grain."
—Psemilla, Meletian poet
thb1.title: Alseid of Life's Bounty

thb2.flavor: "The archon fell like a star from the sky, meeting the rising sun at the horizon's edge." —The Cosmogony
thb2.title: Archon of Falling Stars

thb4.flavor: The Champion reached for a stone, and Heliod placed the sun into her hand. —The Theriad
thb4.title: Banishing Light

thb6.flavor:
"Gazing at the unicorn, I felt closer to the majesty of Nyx than I ever had before."
—Oineus, traveling merchant
thb6.title: Captivating Unicorn

thb7.flavor: "In every one of you I see a hero's heart."
thb7.title: Commanding Presence

thb8.flavor: Is there a greater promise than the glory of the sunrise?
thb8.title: Dawn Evangel

thb11.flavor: Those whose lives were uninspired are doomed to the wretched tedium of Phylias in death.
thb11.title: Dreadful Apathy

thb12.flavor: Death turned admirable conviction into pointless intransigence.
thb12.title: Eidolon of Obstruction

thb15.flavor: "The promise of victory fills my heart. There is no room for fear."
thb15.title: Favored of Iroas

thb16.flavor: An infinite journey in an infinitesimal time.
thb16.title: Flicker of Fate
